text_1: Software developers design computer applications or programs.
text_2_1: The median annual wage for software developers was $120,730 in May 2021.
text_2_2: The median annual wage for software quality assurance analysts and testers was $98,220 in May 2021.
text_4: Software developers, quality assurance analysts, and testers typically need a bachelor’s degree in computer and information technology or a related field. Some employers prefer to hire developers who have a master’s degree.
